name: TheAtlantic
text: Listen: Would defunding the police make us safer? @avitale joins @jameshamblin and @katlwells to discuss on the latest "Social Distance" podcast. https://t.co/4yRpsNNk8J

name: TheAtlantic
text: Amid a global pandemic and growing civil unrest, Los Angeles finally gave the green light for drive-in theaters to reopen. But going to one felt far from normal, @shirklesxp reports: https://t.co/CfzblB6sqz
